tech_news.title: iOS 26.2 is here with Liquid Glass, AirDrop, and Apple Music updates - The Verge
tech_news.description: iOS 26.2 gives iPhones a new way to reduce the Liquid Glass look and introduces AirDrop codes, new features in Apple Podcasts, and “urgent” reminders.

tech_news.title: Google Translate brings real-time speech translations to any headphones - The Verge
tech_news.description: Google Translate will now let users hear live speech translations in any headphones on its Android app, expanding a feature that was once only available with Pixel Buds.

tech_news.title: Amazon pulls AI recap from Fallout TV show after it made several mistakes - BBC
tech_news.description: The errors included getting dialogue wrong and incorrectly claiming a scene was set 100 years earlier than it was.

tech_news.title: Mounts of Mayhem challenges - Minecraft
tech_news.description: Take on two challenges in the Mobs of Mayhem drop and earn dashing rewards! Defeat five mobs with a spear, or help the community spawn 75 million zombie horses! The challenges run from Friday Dec 12, 8:00 AM PT to Monday Dec 15, 10:00 AM PT.

tech_news.title: Id Software devs form "wall-to-wall" union, with 165 workers at Doom studio the latest to vote in favour - Rock Paper Shotgun
tech_news.description: 165 workers at Doom studio id Software have voted to unionise under the Communication Workers of America (CWA).
